bug.author: khituras
bug.summary: HUNFLAIR paper reference is a placeholder
bug.description: On the page <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flairNLP/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/HUNFLAIR.md>https://github.com/flairNLP/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/HUNFLAIR.md</denchmark-link> the link to the paper is just a placeholder link at the moment.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this! We will update the links as soon as our arXiv submission is published, which should be in the next couple of days.
I see. Looking forward to it, this will be an interesting read!
